review: medium noise, value for money, spin speed is good, good permormance overall, lint filter is good, even if you are small family go for 11 kg not 8 kg. best for clothes, blankets and bed sheets washsing. lot better than fully automatic.
Best washing machine under 11000 i bought 7.5 kg.

It's good product. Value for money and also cheaper than local vendor as I checked the price of same product at my local area stores and found expensive. This one is so good. Delivery experience was so good. All accessories were there. Its easy to use. Washer, dryer both working fine. Warrenty also good.I recommend this washing machine.Value for money. Noise level is very less. No vibration. All required features exist.

The media could not be loaded. I don't know what happened to my previous review.Don't buy from this seller, they are delivering damaged products and making us suffer. I noticed that there some package cover was missing, and some rust on the screws near the water leaking area. Amazon's support was good. If you wish buy this check the machine on the first day itself, there so much reviews showing water leakage from drum. Fill water and check. Avoid buying this model and from this seller.In my case i ordered it on 27th dec 2024, received on 29th Dec 2024. Whirlpool technicians delayed the free demo and installation and got demo on 21st Jan 2025. We used the machine on 23rd Jan 2025 and found it to be damaged product. Amazon's return policy was over on 8th Jan 2025 itself.Then Amazon customer care executive asked me to contact whirlpool customer service but ensured that if whirlpool rejects replacement we will help you.Afterwards whirlpool arranged technician to check the issue and issue was confirmed and finally got the replacement machine on 5th Feb 2025. It is a different color, same color will take some time so I decided to end this issue quick.7th Feb 2025. Today the replacement machine is working fineOverall it is a- good washing machine,- this model has drum leakage issue manufacturing defect on some machines maybe,- Amazon support was great- whirlpool support was good and slow process- worst seller
